Title: Transport Broker Management System
Description:
Transport Management system will serve the small freight brokers manage the carriers and orders.
It has features like manage truck owners, carriers, source, destination, orders.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Transport Management system will serve the small freight brokers manage the carriers and orders.
It has features like manage truck owners, carriers, source, destination, orders.

The project is developed using Lightswitch beta and database is SQL Express.

The application has following features.

Manage State- Add, Edit, Delete and Search State

﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Manage City - ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Add Edit Delete and Search City

Manage Truck Owner - Add, Edit, Delete and Search Truck Owner

Manage Carrier - Add Edit Delete and Search Carrier

Manage Source and Destination - Add Edit Delete and Search Source and Destination

Manage Order - Add Edit Delete and Search Order

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
